GSD.description:
nfc: nfcmrvl: Fix memory leak in nfcmrvl_play_deferred

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.124 by commit 0eeec1a8b0cd38c47edeb042980a6aeacecf35ed. For more details please see the references link.
